alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 8:54AM MST until December 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Northern Phillips and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley
